lead_paragraph: If President-elect Donald J. Trump makes good on the promise of punishing overseas companies, he will take aim at his own brand, and his daughter’s as well.

byline.original: By LAURA M. HOLSON and RACHEL ABRAMS

snippet: If President-elect Donald J. Trump makes good on the promise of punishing overseas companies, he will take aim at his own brand, and his daughter’s as well....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald J Trump's promise to adopt protectionist trade policies and restore American manufacturing jobs sits uneasily beside his own apparel business and especially that of his daughter Ivanka, whose merchandise is almost exclusively produced abroad; New York Times review finds that majority of Ivanka Trump brand shoes and handbags are made in China, which has helped keep retail prices low.

headline.main: For the Trumps, ‘Made in U.S.A.’ May Be a Tricky Label to Stitch
headline.print_headline: For the Trumps, ‘Made in U.S.A.’ May Be a Tricky Label to Stitch
